resources.string: Welcome to the Shoe Store Inventory Instructions! When you are ready, click the "Show Me Those Shoes!" button below. On the next screen you will find a list that should already have a few entries to help you get started. By clicking the "Add" button with the plus sign, in the lower right corner, you will be directed to a new screen where you can add the details of the shoes you would like to add to the list. Please remember that ALL detail fields must be filled in or the new entry will be rejected. Once all fields are completed, just press save! If you should find yourself on the entry screen, but do not need to be, just press cancel and you will be returned to the list screen. When you are done, remember to log out. You can do this by clicking on the menu option in the top right corner of the screen and selecting "Log Out." Good Luck!
